title: Liz Truss – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Being Announced as the Next Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Liz Truss, the outgoing Prime Minister, on Twitter on 24 October 2022.
content:
Congratulations Rishi Sunak on being appointed as Leader of the Conservative Party and our next Prime Minister.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association

You have my full support.
